The Best Lemon Bars

Ingredients

  • 2 cups all-purpose flour
  • 1/2 cup powdered sugar
  • 1 cup butter, softened
  • 4 large eggs
  • 2 cups granulated sugar
  • 1/3 cup fresh lemon juice
  • 2 tablespoons lemon zest

Instructions

  1. Preheat oven to 350Â°F.
  2. Mix flour, powdered sugar, and butter for crust.
  3. Press into 9x13 pan and bake 18-20 minutes.
  4. Whisk eggs, sugar, lemon juice, and zest for filling.
  5. Pour over hot crust and bake 20-25 minutes more.
  6. Cool completely and dust with powdered sugar.

Prep Time: 20 minutes

Cook Time: 45 minutes

Serves: 12
